resources.string:
1. Enter your initials
 2. Scan barcode on packs for pack information
 3. Tap on pack information to get information on contents
 4. When ready to fulfill invoices, scan barcode on invoices first, then scan matching pack barcode
 5. If phone vibrates and makes a notification sound, check screen for error
 6. For double packs, scan invoice barcode, then find an appropriate config to use before scanning appropriate packs
 7. Press the Reset button after scanning any invoice to clear the invoice out
 8. For double packs, click on the Scanned text to clear out previously scanned packs

If scanner does not work try these steps:
 1. Restart scanner using small button
 	Wait for beep and try to scan
 2. Re-pair scanner following instructions below
 	Wait for beep and try to scan
 3. Exit and restart app
 	Wait for beep and try to scan
 4. Contact Manager
1) Hold Scan and Power buttons on scanner until device restarts
4) Return to main screen of app and accept pairing request if prompted \n5) Wait for single beep and try to scan
